title: My Portfolio
description: Crafted a dynamic portfolio leveraging HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSX, and JSON, showcasing a blend of interactive design and efficient data handling for a standout, engaging web presence.

title: Blockchain based certificate generation system
description: Integrated Web3.js for blockchain transactions and automated certificate generation, enhancing verification efficiency for governments and organizations.

title: Virtual Assistant
description: Created a voice-controlled assistant with Python that provides time updates, searches Wikipedia, opens websites, and sends emails using SpeechRecognition for accurate voice command processing.

title: Virtual Assistant
description: Designed a responsive calculator UI with CSS, featuring Flexbox and Grid for layout, a sky-blue container, styled buttons with hover effects, and a centered, visually appealing interface.
